title: Competency Enhancement Program for Real-Time Messaging Simulation in Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Real-time clinical scenario interpretation and decision-making training environment using instant messaging platforms

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 90% proficiency in applying patient management protocols based on real clinical scenarios.
Enhance professional ethics and communication competencies by 30% in messaging-based collaborative environments
Maintain over 85% accuracy in medical legal compliance and patient safety-related decision-making within 6 months
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
